positions.subtitle: Global Sovereign Advisory
positions.description: Advisor to several sovereigns in the GCC, Balkans and Latin America in Public Finance Management and FDI strategy. Focused on data-driven governance, fiscal sustainability, and investment promotion.

experience.title: Junior Project Manager and Inclusive Growth Financing Forum
experience.description: Working for the Business for Inclusive Growth (B4IG) coalition which was launched at the G7 summit in Biarritz in August 2019. It brings together the OECD and more than 40 multinationals and organizations to fight against inequality where each coalition member has committed to advancing human rights, promoting inclusive workplaces, and strengthening their value chains and ecosystems.

experience.title: Sovereign Advisory
experience.description: The Sovereign Advisory team accompanies Sovereign and Quasi-Sovereign entities on a range of economic development and financial issues, such as the design and implementation of development and financing strategies, the execution of financing or restructuring transactions, and the management of public assets and contingent liabilities.

honors_and_awards.title: NTSE Scholar- National Talent Search Examination.
honors_and_awards.description: National Talent Search Examination (NTSE) is a scholarship exam conducted by the National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) for identifying talented students who want to pursue higher education in Science and Social Studies streams. The aim of the NTSE scheme is to award a scholarship to talented students who wish to pursue higher education in Science and Social Studies stream to help continue their education.
